user_profile.name: Sofia Mendoza
user_profile.description: Sofia is a 21-year-old university student from Colombia, immersed in a technology program and naturally drawn to detailed technical discussions. Although she has novice tech experience, her friendly personality makes her approachable, particularly in academic settings where she often feels the pressure of urgent tasks. Currently, she seeks to find an accessible home due to her sedentary lifestyle and the need for a conducive environment for both her studies and personal growth.

instructions.dialogue: Share some key information but keep some details private.
instructions.profile: Share most of your profile information when asked.
instructions.hidden_state: Express clear emotions and intentions in your inner thoughts.

examples: I need a smartphone with a good camera and decent battery life. Something reliable for everyday use.
